titles.title: Fresh Precure!
Fresh Pretty Cure
Fresh Pretty Cure!
fpc
precure6
フレッシュプリキュア!

relatedanime.anime: Eiga Precure All Stars DX: Minna Tomodachi - Kiseki no Zen`in Daishuugou!
Eiga Fresh Precure! Omocha no Kuni wa Himitsu ga Ippai!?

anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch5758 [Momozono Love] is a 14-year-old student at Yotsuba Junior High School who tends to care more for others than for herself. One day she visits a show of the famous dance unit Trinity and decides to become a dancer, too. At the same event, subordinates of the Labyrinth Kingdom show up wanting to collect the unhappiness of the audience. Love gets the power to change into http://anidb.net/ch5761 [Cure Peach] and fights against them. Soon after, she is joined by her good friends http://anidb.net/ch5759 [Miki], who is http://anidb.net/ch5762 [Cure Berry], and http://anidb.net/ch5760 [Inori], who becomes http://anidb.net/ch5763 [Cure Pine].

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: shoujo
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shoujo, literally meaning "girl", refers to a female audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: uniform -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED
tag.description: The "uniform" tag is to be split and removed. Please help by tagging the character with the appropriate kind of uniform (e.g. school uniform, maid dress, etc) and removing this tag from them, and by not adding this tag to any further characters. Thank you.

tag.name: magical girl
tag.description: Magical girls (also known both in Japan and in the West as mahou shoujo, and in Japan as majokko) are young girls with superhuman abilities of magical nature. In the early years, magical girls usually used magic to solve everyday problems and often transformed into idols; nowadays, however, the term is most often used to refer to with girls who fight evil using magical powers, and, although transformations are still common, they tend to be more along the lines of a change of costume.

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: super power
tag.description: Be it an ancient Greek Heracles, a cybernetic muscle-man, or a fourteen year-old girl in a mini-skirted sailor suit. As long as they have super powers, they`re in the show.

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: henshin
tag.description: Japanese for "transformation" (metamorphosis or disguise). A "henshin anime" is any anime, where the characters or their costumes transform, such as Sailor Moon. The henshin switches on the character`s special powers, and is frequently accompanied by a costume change. Often the change of clothing is the only outward indicator that the character has changed and yet nobody seems to notice the hero`s true self. Most henshin heroes have a special item which they use to change into their heroic form. These items are usually activated by a command phrase (which is often in Engrish, for some reason), triggering a transformation sequence.

tag.name: friendship
tag.description: The feeling of trust, kindness, and friendship between a group of high school students for example, is a central theme of this anime.

tag.name: predominantly female cast
tag.description: A show with a predominantly female cast has mostly females as main and secondary cast members while few if any male characters have major roles. This also applies when a male lead is surrounded by females of lesser individual plot relevance, such as in a harem setting.

tag.name: female protagonist
tag.description: The anime has a female protagonist.

tag.name: monster of the week
tag.description: On a pretty much regular basis — weekly or episodic — the protagonists engage in some kind of conflict. This can be an actual showdown between mecha, or the all-out fight against an enemy, or a (car) race that needs to be won. This can make the anime quite repetitive.

tag.name: secret identity
tag.description: The (usually main) protagonist has a secret identity that he or she desperately tries to keep secret. This can lead to all sorts of amusing misunderstandings, thus is used as comedy element in some anime.

tag.name: ass-kicking girls
tag.description: The female characters in the anime are very proficient in some form of martial arts, swordplay, or gunfights. They may also have super powers.

tag.name: TO BE MOVED TO CHARACTER
tag.description: Tags under this parent tag are going to be moved to character tags and removed from the anime they`re currently assigned to. They will be blocked from the anime system once that move is complete. Please help with that job if you know what characters they should be assigned to.

tag.name: tropes
tag.description: A trope is a commonly recurring literary and rhetorical devices, motifs or clichés in creative works. This use is a broader redefining of a literary trope, the use of figurative language, via word, phrase, or even an image, for artistic effect, such as using a figure of speech. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Momozono Love
character.description: Love is a hyperactive, sympathetic and emotional girl, who tries her best at matchmaking but often fails. She adores dancing and is a big fan of the dancing unit "Trinity". She also dislikes sports and studying. She is being taught dancing by Miyuki, the leader of dancing group "Trinity"( Miyuki decides to teach her as thanks for saving her in ep one, whom she admires. She later forms a group with her childhood friends, Miki and Inori. Love has dirty blond hair that is shoulder length which she wears in two tight ponytails at the top of her head.

character.name: Aono Miki
character.description: Good at sports, also has sense in fashion and tries to warn herself of showing her beauty to others. She wants to be a fashion model, so she tries to control herself. Her house is a hair&nail salon, and she lives with her mother, Remi Aono. She joins the dancing group with Love because she wants to control her shape. Miki has long, silky lavender coloured hair that falls to her waist. Her attack comes from the French word "espoir", meaning "hope", which was most notably used in Yes! Pretty Cure 5 as the name of the beauty shop owned by Nozomi Yumehara`s mother.

character.name: Cure Peach
character.description: Cure Peach is Momozono Love`s alter ego when transforming. Attack: Pretty Cure! Love Sunshine! PowerUp: Pretty Cure! Love Shinshine Fresh!

character.name: Cure Berry
character.description: Cure Berry is Aono Miki`s alter ego when transforming. Attack: Pretty Cure! Espoir Shower!

character.name: Cure Pine
character.description: Cure Pine is Yamabuki Inori`s alter ego when transforming. Attack: Pretty Cure! Healing Prayer!

character.name: Chiffon
character.description: A baby fairy from the Kingdom of Sweets, he likes to have practical joke with others. Chiffon often use espers power (ESP) to make people have trouble and laugh. Love and others, including Tart, take care of him. The mark on his forehead gives a light that has many different abilities, including giving the power for the Pretty Cures to transform and give them power ups.

character.name: Tart
character.description: He takes Chiffon to the human world from the Kingdom of Sweets, on his search for the Pretty Cures. A ferret-like fairy, he is Chiffon`s caretaker, but always has trouble with taking care of him. He is always anxious but kind, and has an Osakian accent. He is prone to worry and often grumbles, but becomes weak to a good story and will become over emotional. He also loves doughnuts as well.

character.name: Higashi Setsuna
character.description: She first starts as a cold and isolated teenage girl loyal only to Moebius which, due to her behavior when she is defeated, can be seen as an obsession. After spending time with the girls as a spy, she begins to wonder what makes her happy and slowly opens up to them. Following a final battle with Cure Peach, her life was offered to fill the Life Gauge and she died. However, she was saved by the Akarun and Chiffon, and is reborn as Cure Passion. After agreement she lives with the Momozonos, joins the dancing group and attends Public Yotsuba Junior High School with Love. She has dark purple hair as Setsuna, bluish-white hair as Eas and long light pink hair when in Pretty Cure form. Her Pickrun, the Akarun, is red, wears a ribbon on its head and has angel wings. Passion`s theme colors are red and black and her symbol is stated to be the club or clover.

character.name: Eas
character.description: Higashi Setsuna`s alter ego when transforming, one of the Labyrinth villains.

character.name: Nishi Hayato
character.description: At first sight, he might seem like a heartthrob, but in truth, he`s a tough muscle who doesn`t likes to be messed with. His theme color is yellow.

character.name: Wester
character.description: Nishi Hayato`s alter ego as one of the Labyrinth villains.

character.name: Minami Shun
character.description: He is calm and reserved, and resembles Mucardia from the previous series, Yes! Pretty Cure 5 GoGo. After putting lumps and lumps of sugar in his tea during episode 1, he started to wonder why people from our dimension made drinks like that. His theme color is green.

character.name: Souler
character.description: Minami Shun`s alter ego as one of the Labyrinth villains.

character.name: Chinen Miyuki
character.description: Famous dance unit Trinity`s leader, and Love`s group dance coach. Love absolutely admires her. She has magenta hair and red outfits.

character.name: Kaoru-chan
character.description: He sells donuts in a park. His age and his home are unknown. When Love and others are upset, he plays the consultant role and encourages them.

character.name: Cure Passion
character.description: After being saved by Akarun and Chiffon, Eas is reborn as Cure Passion.

character.name: Clover
character.description: Dances group in Clover Town consisting of the four Fresh Pretty Cures and coached by Chinen Miyuki

episode.title: もぎたてフレッシュ! キュアピーチ誕生!!
Freshly-Picked Fresh! Cure Peach Is Born!!
Mogitate Fresh! Cure Peach Tanjou!!
episode.summary: The fairy elder goes to Pretty Cure Forest and prays in the corresponding temple. Lightning strikes the temple and the elder sees four Pickruns flying away. Meanwhile, in the human world, Love goes to the dance unit Trinity event. On the way, a huge monster called a Nakewameke appears, ruining the event. Love tries to protect her idol, Miyuki. Suddenly, the Pirun appears and goes to her mobile phone, transforming her into Cure Peach and allowing her to battle the monster.

episode.title: つみたてフレッシュ! キュアベリー誕生!!
Freshly-Gathered Fresh! Cure Berry Is Born!!
Tsumitate Fresh! Cure Berry Tanjou!!
episode.summary: After the battle, Tart appears in front of Love. According to Tart, she is the legendary warrior, Precure, who has to stop Mobius` ambition. Love is shocked upon hearing this. Tart tells Love that they need to find the other three Precure. Meanwhile, Miki encounters a vending machine-like Nakewameke, and transforms into Cure Berry through the use of the Blun to protect her brother.

episode.title: 消えたハンバーグ! 大好きなものを守れ!!
The Missing Hamburger! Protect Your Favourite Things!!
Kieta Hamburger! Daisuki na Mono o Mamore!!
episode.summary: Love buys hamburgers at the shop where her mother works. After Love finishes cooking the hamburgers disappear due to Souler`s Nakewameke. Later on, the same Nakewameke erases the Cures` mothers, and it is up to the Cures to finish off the Nakewameke.

episode.title: 遊園地でドキドキ! ワクワクデート気分!?
My Heart`s Racing at the Amusement Park! Those Trembling Dating Feelings!?
Yuuenchi de Dokidoki! Wakuwaku Date Kibun!?
episode.summary: Three boys from Love`s school go on a triple date with the girls. Wester makes a panda cart become a Nakewameke and causes chaos, that is unless the girls stop him.

episode.title: シフォンが迷子? 町中もう大騒ぎ!!
Chiffon Is a Lost Child? The Town Is in an Uproar!!
Chiffon ga Maigo? Machijuu Mou Oosawagi!!
episode.summary: Chiffon goes missing and causes a lot of trouble in town, it`s up to the girls to find her.

episode.title: とれたてフレッシュ! キュアパイン誕生!!
Freshly-Harvested Fresh! Cure Pine Is Born!!
Toretate Fresh! Cure Pine Tanjou!!
episode.summary: Inori has begun feeling a bit left out because she is too shy to dance with Love and Miki. She finds comfort in taking care of a little boy`s dog. When the dog becomes a Nakewameke, Inori gains the ability to transform into Cure Pine through the Kirun.

episode.title: せつなとラブ 友情のクローバー!
Setsuna and Love: The Clover of Friendship!
Setsuna to Love: Yuujou no Clover!
episode.summary: Setsuna goes to the town centre to meet Love according to fortune telling. Love is playing Lucky Draw in town when Setsuna meets her. She asked Love to give a tour of the town, on the way, she tries to steal Love`s Linkrun.

episode.title: シフォン大ピンチ! ピーチの新しい力!!
Chiffon`s in Big Trouble! Peach`s New Powers!!
Chiffon Dai Pinch! Peach no Atarashii Chikara!!
episode.summary: Love accidentally forgot to refil the Cure Vitan, Chiffon`s food, and lost the contact to get more. Chiffon cannot get food from Linkrun, so Love has to cook something for Chiffon. Cure Peach`s new weapon, the Peach Rod, first appears in this episode.

episode.title: 美希の夢 私プリキュアやめる!!
Miki`s Dream: I`m Leaving Pretty Cure!
Miki no Yume: Watashi Precure Yameru!!
episode.summary: Miki wants to be a famous top model around the world. One day she got the chance for the audition; if she passes the audition, she can get the chance to be a model overseas. She is very happy, but at the same time, she thinks of Love and Inori, because if she passes, she has to say farewell to them. She is puzzled when she realizes that she has to quit dance and Pretty Cure in order to fulfill her dream.

episode.title: タルトが祈里で祈里がタルト!?
Tarte is Inori, Inori is Tarte!?
Tarte ga Inori de Inori ga Tarte!?
episode.summary: Inori is afraid of ferrets, so she dare not to approach Tart. One day, from Souler`s Nakewameke they swap bodies and it is up to the girls to stop him.

episode.title: ミユキの怒り! もうダンスは教えない!?
Miyuki`s Anger! She Won`t Teach Dancing Anymore!?
Miyuki no Ikari! Mou Dance wa Oshienai!?
episode.summary: The girls come late to a dance session. Miyuki gets angry at this and she won`t teach the girls dancing anymore.

episode.title: みんなで変身! フサフサ大作戦!!
Let`s Transform! The Fringy Tactic!!
Minna de Henshin! Fusafusa Daisakusen!!
episode.summary: Wester turns one of Love`s dad`s wigs into a Nakewameke, which gives everyone in Clover Town Street weird hairstyles.instead of what westar`s wished,the children is happy,though.

episode.title: シフォンが病気!? パインの新しい力!!
Chiffon Is Sick!? Pine`s New Power!!
Chiffon ga Byouki!? Pine no Atarashii Chikara!!
episode.summary: When Chiffon falls ill, Inori is tasked with nursing her back to health. Cure Pine`s new weapon, the Pine Flute, makes its debut.

episode.title: Opening 1
Ending 1
4人目のプリキュア!? アカルンを探せ!!
The Fourth Pretty Cure!? Search for Akarun!!
4 Ninme no Precure!? Akarun o Sagase!!
episode.summary: Now that Chiffon is able to talk, she tells of four special Pickruns. These give the girls the ability to become Pretty Cure and grant them powers. Three of them, the Pirun, the Blun, and the Kirun, are found. All that remains is the Akarun, a red Pickrun...

episode.title: せつなとラブ 相手を思いやる心!
Setsuna and Love: The Heart That Cares Each Other.
Setsuna to Love: Aite o Omoiyaru Kokoro
episode.summary: Love meets with Setsuna once again. Setsuna learns that Love truly trusts her as a friend.

episode.title: 恐怖の文化祭! 夜の学校に響く足音!!
Culture Festival of Terror! Echoing Footsteps on School at Night!!
Kyoufu no Bunkasai! Yoru no Gakkou ni Hibiku Ashioto!!
episode.summary: It`s time for the Culture Festival in Love`s school. Love and Daisuke has a fight during school. When Love gets trapped inside the school with Daisuke, they have to work together to escape the Nakewameke.

episode.title: シフォンはまかせて! ベリーの新しい力!!
Leave It to Chiffon! Berry`s New Power!!
Chiffon wa Makasete! Berry no Atarashii Chikara!!
episode.summary: Miki is tasked with babysitting Chiffon. Cure Berry`s new weapon, the Berry Sword, makes it first appearance.

episode.title: プリキュアに会いたい! 小さな女の子の願い!!
Want to Meet Pretty Cure! The Little Girl`s Wish!!
Precure ni Aitai! Chiisana Onnanoko no Negai!!
episode.summary: Love and the girls meet a terminally ill girl in a hospital. Having seen Pretty Cure before, the sick girl wishes to meet them.

episode.title: 新たなカード! イースの新しい力!!
The New Card! Eas` New Power!!
Arata na Card! Eas no Atarashii Chikara!!
episode.summary: Mobius, the being running Labyrinth, sees that it`s time to destroy Pretty Cure. He gives Eas a new card, but the card has bad side effects to the user...

episode.title: ダンスとプリキュア... どちらを選ぶ!?
Dance and Pretty Cure... Which to Choose?
Dance to Precure... Dochira o Erabu!?
episode.summary: Due to all the training for a dance competition, the girls are worn out and are being slowed down. They have to choose whether to keep dancing or live on being just Pretty Cure.

episode.title: 4人目のプリキュアはあんさんや!!
The Fourth Pretty Cure`s Whereabouts!!
4-ninme no Precure wa Ansan Ya!!
episode.summary: The night before the dance competition, the girls are hospitalized due to fatigue. Miyuki realizes that while it`s important to focus on dance, it`s also important to focus on recovery. She soon finds about Pretty Cure, but refuses to become the red Cure.

episode.title: せつなとラブ あなたがイースなの!?
Setsuna and Love: You Are Eas!?
Setsuna to Love: Anata ga Eas na no!?
episode.summary: After being discharged, the girls believe that Miyuki is the fourth member of Pretty Cure. They go on another search for the Akarun. However, they run into Eas again, who reveals her identity as Setsuna.

episode.title: イースの最期! キュアパッション誕生!!
The End of Eas! Cure Passion Is Born!!
Eas no Saigo! Cure Passion Tanjou!!
episode.summary: Setsuna is purified by Cure Peach and becomes something she`d never thought she would become: the red Cure of happiness, Cure Passion.

episode.title: せつなの苦悩 私は仲間になれない!
The Passionate Pretty Cure Is Born! My Name Is Cure Passion!
Setsuna no Kunou: Watashi wa Nakama ni Narenai!
episode.summary: Setsuna, who has just become Cure Passion, doesn`t have a place to go back to. While she`s walking down the street, she meets Love, who`s going to a restaurant with her parents.

episode.title: Opening 2
Ending 2
イース対パッション!? 私は生まれ変わる!!
Eas vs. Cure Passion!
Eas Tai Passion!? Watashi wa Umarekawaru!!
episode.summary: Setsuna is haunted by her past deeds as Eas and must confront them when a doppelganger of Eas attacks the Pretty Cures.

episode.title: 4つのハート! 私も踊りたい!!
The Four Hearts! I Also Want to Dance!
Yottsu no Heart! Watashi mo Odoritai!!
episode.summary: Setsuna feels that she wants to join Clover, the dancing group formed by Love, Miki, and Inori.

episode.title: 夏だ! 祭りだ! オードリー!!
The Summer! The Festival! Audrey!!
Natsu Da! Matsuri Da! Audrey!!
episode.summary: During the summer festival, the girls meet a comedy duo called Audrey.

episode.title: 大切な記憶! おじいちゃんとの思い出!!
Precious Memories! Memories of Grandpa!!
Taisetsu na Kioku! Ojii-chan to no Omoide!!
episode.summary: Remembering the time spent with her grandfather, a Nakewameke causes Love to dream of being reunited with him. However, Love must choose between staying with her grandfather in this dream world or helping her friends defeat the Nakewameke.

episode.title: 謎だらけの男! カオルちゃんの正体!?
The Man of Secrets! Kaoru-chan`s True Self!?
Nazodarake no Otoko! Kaoru-chan no Shoutai!?
episode.summary: The girls and Tart begin to realize something is up with Kaoru and they investigate.

episode.title: タルト危機一髪! 正体がばれちゃう!?
Tart in Danger! His True Self Exposed!?
Tart Kikiippatsu! Shoutai ga Barechau!?
episode.summary: One day, Tart starts having stomachaches. Ayumi, Love`s Mother, brings him to Dr. Yamabuki`s, not knowing Tart is actually a fairy from the Sweets Kingdom!

episode.title: ラブと大輔 仲直りのしかた!
Love and Daisuke: The Make Up Strategy!
Love to Daisuke: Nakanaori no Shikata!
episode.summary: The new school term has begun. Love is happy seeing that Setsuna has become popular in Yotsuba Junior High, but Daisuke isn`t happy...

episode.title: さようなら! タルトとシフォン!!
Goodbye! Tart and Chiffon!!
Sayounara! Tart to Chiffon!!
episode.summary: Tart and Chiffon return to the Sweets Kingdom, and the Cures have accompanied them. That, and they find out Tart is the Prince of the Kingdom and is engaged to a pink ferret named Azukiina. The Clover music box of Happiness debuts in this episode.

episode.title: 美希とせつなのこわいもの!
What Miki and Setsuna are Afraid Of!
Miki to Setsuna no Kowaimono!
episode.summary: Miki has trouble fighting an octopus Nakewameke, because she has a fear of octopuses.

episode.title: インフィニティ現れる! 明日を取り戻せ!!
Infinity Arrives! Reclaim Tomorrow!!
Infinity Arawareru! Ashita o Torimodose!!
episode.summary: The treasure Infinity makes its appearance, a new villain arrives to aid Moebius, and a whole day gets replayed over and over.

episode.title: シフォンの隠された秘密!
Chiffon`s Hidden Secret!
Chiffon no Kakusareta Himitsu!
episode.summary: Chiffon is apparently more powerful than she appears to be like making herself a pickrun,giving the cures a boost of power,and more!

episode.title: 新たな敵! その名はノーザ!!
A New Enemy! Her Name is Northa!
Arata na Teki! Sono Na wa Northa!!
シフォンを守れ! プリキュアの新しい力!!
Protect Chiffon! Pretty Cure`s New Power!!
Chiffon o Mamore! Precure no Atarashii Chikara!!
episode.summary: Pretty Cure get intense training from Miyuki, and Chiffon grants them a new power: the group attack, Lucky Clover Grand Finale.

episode.title: クローバーボックスをさがせ!!
Find the Clover Box!!
Clover Box o Sagase!!
episode.summary: Miki loses the Clover music box by accident and now she must protect it from Labyrinth`s hands.

episode.title: ケンカは禁止? 沖縄修学旅行!!
Fight the Ban? Okinawan School Trip!
Kenka wa Kinshi? Okinawa Shuugakuryokou!!
episode.summary: Love and Setsuna go to Okinawa on a research trip together with their classmates.

episode.title: せつなとラブ お母さんが危ない!
Setsuna and Love: Mom is in Danger!
Setsuna to Love: Okaasan ga Abunai!
episode.summary: Setsuna suspects that something is wrong with Love`s mother, Ayumi, and discovers that Love`s "mother" was a Sorewaatase clone of the real one.

episode.title: 祈里と健人の船上パーティ!
Inori and Kento`s Boat Party!
Inori to Kento no Senjou Party!
episode.summary: Kento invites Inori to a boat party on a ship.

episode.title: ラビリンスからの招待状!
The Invitation from Labyrinth!
Labyrinth kara no Shoutaijou!
episode.summary: Setsuna is hostage by Northa ,and it`s up to her friends to rescue her from being brainwashed back into Labyrinth!

episode.title: 世界を救え! プリキュア対ラビリンス!!
Save the World! Pretty Cure Against Labyrinth!!
Sekai o Sukue! Precure Tai Labyrinth!!
episode.summary: The Pretty Cures enter into labyrinth`s base in order to destroy the `fuko gage` as they are fighting against Northa and her tricks.

episode.title: 妖しき草笛! 奪われたシフォン!!
Suspicious Reedpipe! Chiffon is Stolen!!
Ayashiki Kusabue! Ubawareta Chiffon!!
episode.summary: Northa comes up with a plan to kidnap Chiffon by distracting Pretty Cure.

episode.title: 4人はプリキュア! クリスマスイブの別れ!!
We are Four Pretty Cures! Separation in Christmas!!
4-nin wa Precure! Christmas Eve no Wakare!!
episode.summary: Love and her friends decide to save Chiffon but they will have to reveal their identities as Pretty Cure in front of their parents and friends.

episode.title: サウラーとウエスター 最期の戦い!!
Souler and Wester`s Last Battle!!
Souler to Wester: Saigo no Takatai!!
episode.summary: Moebius sends Souler and Wester to defeat Pretty Cure without them knowing that he had something else in mind. Note: This was the first Pretty Cure episode to air in the 2010s.

episode.title: 世界が変わる! ドーナツが起こした奇跡!!
Change the World! The Miracle Donuts!!
Sekai ga Kawaru! Donuts ga Okoshita Kiseki!!
episode.summary: The denizens of Labyrinth were changed by Tart, Azukina and...donuts!

episode.title: 最終決戦! キュアエンジェル誕生!!
Final Decisive Battle! The Birth of Cure Angel!!
Saishuu Kessen! Cure Angel Tanjou!!
episode.summary: Things seemed hopeless for Pretty Cure until two new heroes and the people of Labyrinth came to help them.

episode.title: 驚きの真実! メビウスの本当の姿!!
The Shocking Truth! Moebius` True Form
Odoroki no Shinjitsu! Moebius no Hontou no Sugata!!
episode.summary: Moebius isn`t what he seems to be...

episode.title: 笑顔がいっぱい! みんなで幸せゲットだよ!!
So Many Smiles! Everyone Will Get Their Happiness!!
Egao ga Ippai! Minna de Shiawase Get Da yo!!
episode.summary: The final battle between Cure Angel and Moebius. Will Pretty Cure be able to save Chiffon and the parallel worlds in time? Anyway, Love, Miki, Inori and Setsuna toward to face for the new future. But, what will happen to Tsubomi and Erika...
